title: Premiere: Dirty Nice – Zero Summer
content:
With their debut track clocking up an impressive 400k Spotify plays since release in March of this year, Dirty Nice are back in time for warmer months with the appropriately titled, Zero Summer.

There’s definitely a hint of Prince and Jai Paul to the plush, funky production and the air of romantic nostalgia that underpins the songwriting.

Whilst there’s still little information circulating about Dirty Nice, aside from a carefully composed Instagram, the two tracks thus are more than enough to make this is a deliriously exciting project. Check out Zero Summer below, alongside the previously released Keeping it Together.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
